data.title: Action Center Events
data.meta_description: Watch the crash 'em smash 'em action at the Waukesha County Fair Action Center. The two-hour Demotion Derby is always a loud & exciting crowd-pleaser!
data.text:
Demolition Derby

FREE WITH PAID ADMISSION TO THE FAIR

Held at the Action Center located just beyond the Miller Lite Main Stage on the north end of the Fairgrounds

Saturday, July 20 | 1 pm

an International Demolition Derby event

Sponsored by G-Brock’s Auto Repair and Central Machine

Additional sponsors include: Ace Ready Mix, Bobcat Plus, Carl F. Statz & Sons, Inc., Eric Jacobson Grading, Express Towing & Recovery, Fabick Rents, GSI Tow Truck Insurance, JCB of Milwaukee, Laue’s Landscape & Design Solutions, LF George, Inc., Miller-Bradford & Risberg, Inc., Proven Power, Triple K Farms, Waukesha Landscape Supply, Waupun Equipment, Wollenzein Farms, and All World Transmission & Service with special thanks to Jim & Mary Taege

The Demo is always a great crowd-pleaser located on the north end of the grounds. Watch the smash’em, crash’em action on Saturday afternoon! The show is approximately two hours and has up to 4 heats.

CLASSES: Compact, Midsize, Full Size Stock, Super Stock (Semi Weld), Full Size (Weld), Mini Trucks and Vans, Full Size Trucks and Vans, Garden Tractors, and Gut & Go

RULES:

Compact

Midsize

Full Size Stock

Super Stock (Semi Weld)

Full Size (Weld)

Mini Trucks and Vans

Full Size Trucks and Vans

Garden Tractors

Gut & Go

Consent Forms and Registration can be found at International Demolition Derby. Any questions, please call 219-363-8896 or 219-363-7499.

7th Annual Power Wheels Demo Derby

This crowd favorite is returning to entertain kids of all ages. Registration is through International Demolition Derby. Any questions, please call 219-363-8896 or 219-363-7499.
